alert.note: Alert for Phillips (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 7:36PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Phillips and southwestern Coahoma Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 736 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Crumrod, or near White River National Wildlife Refuge, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Crumrod, Rena Lara, Mosby Spur, Ferguson, Bobo, Green Grove, Lundell and Hillhouse. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
